entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
